alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 5:36AM EST until February 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, East Juliette, West Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Hawkinsville, Clinchfield, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding of lowlands adjacent to the river begins. The water level reaches the top of the Abbeville boat ramp and also begins to flood the nearby park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 11.9 feet and rising very slowly. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 12 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
